summary: A container class that aggregates multiple pinhole camera instances into a single batched representation. It inherits all properties of a single pinhole camera while adding an extra dimension so that intrinsic and extrinsic tensors are stacked across the camera list, enabling collective operations on a set of cameras.
business_intent: Simplify multi‑camera workflows in computer‑vision applications by providing a unified, batch‑compatible interface for handling, initializing, and querying a collection of pinhole cameras.
